name: Everything Bagel Soft Pretzels
description: Make a batch of Epicure's Basic Pizza Dough or save time and start with store-bought pizza dough. Both make big, fluffy, chubby pretzels best eaten straight out of the oven!

ingredients.name: Easy Peasy Bagel, Pancake & Waffle Mix
egg + 1 tbsp water or milk, lightly beaten

preparation: Cut pizza dough into 6 pieces and roll each one into a rectangle.
Starting with one long edge, roll up dough to form a log. Using both hands, roll log into a long rope at least 16" long.

Form each rope into the shape of a pretzel, then place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Generously brush tops with egg wash, then liberally sprinkle with Sea Salt. Bake until golden, 15–17 minutes.
tips: How to shape pretzels:  Shape rope into an upside down “U.”  Bring ends up towards top middle of “U.”  Flip ends over top of “U” so that the “knot” is in the centre.
